Author: marcus
Content:
You are doing it wrong, you are not supposed to cover the taste of coffee with crap like sugar and cream.

It's like trying to fall in love with a girl by putting more clothes on her, our biology works in exactly the opposite way.

A good double espresso sugarless and cream-less is the way to go.

Author: damon
Content: I really wish I liked coffee.  I've tried time after time to get hooked on coffee but couldn't manage to stomach it - even loaded with cream and sugar.  It smells great, has ample caffeine, can be bought cheap, all the makings of a perfect drink.
